dict.acceptation: 严重地，大量地；沉重地，沉闷地；猛烈地；

sent.orig: Breathing heavily, the fat man levered himself out of the chair.
sent.trans: 那个胖子喘着粗气从椅子里站了起来。

sent.orig: And Mr Dumont's party was heavily outspent by the Liberals and the Parti Qué bé cois.
sent.trans: 而且自由党和魁人党的竞选开支也远远超过了杜蒙的党派。

sent.orig: The Virago was a prized possession, a heavily modified MandalMoters StarViper built to his exacting specifications.
sent.trans: “泼妇”号是一件珍贵的财产，是一架按照他的严格意愿大大改动了的曼德尔发动机“星际毒蛇”战机。

sent.orig: People who drives when they are drunk should be heavily penalised.
sent.trans: 醉酒驾车的人应受重罚。

sent.orig: Some people dwell very heavily on the negative events in their lives.
sent.trans: 有一些人因他们生活中的负面事件而活得很累。
